title: S9E018 – "Keep Yourself Together" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
Raz T. Slasher provides two chilling experiences for this week's dive into terror. In the first tale, a man recalls his former days at a planetarium...and the strange employee there, developing a show that is out of this world. In the second, a PTSD soldier finds rest and relaxation in a cabin in the woods, until he and his friend go to seek out what is making all the noises out there late at night.

To watch the podcast on YouTube: http://bit.ly/ChillingEntertainmentYT


Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: http://bit.ly/ScaryStoriesPodcast


If you like the show, telling a friend about it would be amazing! You can text, email, Tweet, or send this link to a friend: http://bit.ly/ScaryStoriesPodcast



Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
